page.title: 01FARMING
page.content:
FARMS IN OUR SURVEY AREA: {SMERALL FARM}owned by Donald Sandison {BOWER TOWER MAINS}owned by John Macadie {SMIDYQUOY FARM}owned by Jim Farquhar {CAMSTER FARM}owned by Chaqrlie Alexander {HALCRO FARM}owned by Donald Douglas
{Farming in Bower}is mainly all mixed farming. Nearly all the farmers grow Oats and Barley and keep cattle and sheep. They keep mixed breeds of cattle such as{Hereford, Charolais, {Simmental}and{Aberdeen Angus}bulls and any breed of cows. Their sheep are{ {North County Cheviot, Leciester}or various breeds of{Black Faced}sheep. John Mackay is the only farmer in Bower to grow{Oil Seed Rape}and{Winter {Wheat.}All the farmers have a Truck or something else to go round their stock
